sentence.Network_en: Service was outstandingly friendly and efficient, falling down on only one detail.
sentence.Network_cn: 服务态度极佳，效率也蛮高，仅在一个小地方不尽人意。

sentence.Network_en: How-ever, the main core of the company performed outstandingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而，该公司的主营业务却表现出色。

sentence.Network_en: Salzburg is an outstandingly beautiful place to visit.
sentence.Network_cn: 萨尔茨堡是个风景非常秀丽的游览之地。

entry.def: You use outstandingly to emphasize how good, or occasionally how bad, something is.

example.ex: Salzburg is an outstandingly beautiful place to visit...
example.tran: 萨尔茨堡是个风景非常秀丽的游览之地。

example.ex: All his novels were outstandingly well written.
example.tran: 他的每一部小说都写得令人击掌。

means.word_mean: 1. in an outstanding manner or to an outstanding degree;

sentences.sentence: "she was outstandingly successful in her profession"

means.word_mean: 2. to a remarkably degree or extent;

auth_sentence.content: He has given the listener something new, and indeed something outstandingly good.
auth_sentence.res_content: He has given the listener something new, and indeed something outstandingly good.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has given the listener something new, and indeed something outstandingly good.

auth_sentence.content: He is consistently humble and wise, outstandingly gifted yet a common man.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is consistently humble and wise, outstandingly gifted yet a common man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is consistently humble and wise, outstandingly gifted yet a common man.

auth_sentence.content: For grief stricken human beings, as well as for geese, one effect is that they become outstandingly vulnerable to accidents.
auth_sentence.res_content: For grief stricken human beings, as well as for geese, one effect is that they become outstandingly vulnerable to accidents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For grief stricken human beings, as well as for geese, one effect is that they become outstandingly vulnerable to accidents.

sentences.en: Owen has played outstandingly this season.
sentences.cn: 欧文在这个赛季表现极佳。
